snippet: A sheriff said he was investigating the cyberbullying of Rebecca Ann Sedwick, who jumped to her death on Monday at an old cement business in Lakeland.
abstract: Sheriff Grady Judd of Polk County, Fla, says he is investigating cyberbullying of 12-year-old Rebecca Ann Sedwick, who jumped to her death at an old cement business in Lakeland.
lead_paragraph: A sheriff said he was investigating the cyberbullying of Rebecca Ann Sedwick, who jumped to her death on Monday at an old cement business in Lakeland.

headline.main: Florida: Bullying Investigated After Girl, 12, Kills Herself
headline.print_headline: Florida: Bullying Investigated After Girl, 12, Kills Herself
